summary: Expose the Replayer API in the PHP SDK to allow users to replay workflow histories against new workflow code for non-determinism checking and local debugging, following the pattern already implemented in the Go SDK.
userImpact: Users cannot verify workflow code changes for non-determinism or debug production workflows locally without the Replayer API.
proposedFix: Wrap the existing Replayer API from other SDKs and expose it to PHP developers following the same pattern used in Go SDK.
resolutionDetails: Replayer API was implemented and exposed in the PHP SDK following the reference implementations from other SDKs.
keyQuote: The purpose of the replayer is: replay workflow histories against new workflow code to check for non-determinism
